overview_of_class: This course explores contemporary South Korean popular culture as a case study for how globalization takes place in the cultural realm. Instead of assuming globalization as a foregone conclusion or as a uniform process, we will examine the debates between the various proponents and critics of cultural globalization, as well as consider the transnational circulation and consumption of Korean pop culture within their particular geopolitical and historical contexts.
